content: a simple and fun sock pattern worked from the cuff down with a short row heel and a rounded toe i have given instructions for 3 sizes and the pattern to be worked in magic loop but you may use what ever method of sock knitting you prefer the stitch texture is a simple two row repeat the columns of knit stiches create little v s down the sock which reminded me of fish tails the garter stitch bumps create a wavy texture which reminded me of the sea and waves i hope you have as much fun knitting this as i did and if you have any questions please feel free to message me
